name: Cryo
description:
You wake up in snowy woods and find yourself in the middle of a seemingly endless "cold" assault by Snowboos. All you have is your trusty hatchet. Mysterious first aid kits keep appearing occassionally. How long can you survive your inevitable "cold" death? Do you have what it takes to put an end to this chaos?

I am a new developer and this is my first ever published game! I made it for the ACM Winter Game Jam 2021 (5-day game jam. Theme given - Snowy Chaos) - my first game jam participation. I hope you would enjoy this game! Open to feedbacks and suggestions :)
